value:
Network of individuals and their known social associations, centered around the hijackers that carried out the September 11th, 2001 terrorist attacks. Associations extracted after-the-fact from public data. Metadata labels say which plane a person was on, if any, on 9/11.[^icon]
[^icon]: Description obtained from the [ICON](https://icon.colorado.edu) project.
['V. Krebs, \Mapping networks of terrorist cells.\" Connections 24
